question.text: Saddle joint is present between __i__ and hinge joint is present between __ii__.

options.text: i: Carpal and metacarpal of thumb, ii: Knee joint
i: Tarsal, ii: between radius and ulna
i: Carpal and metacarpal of thumb, ii: shoulder

solution.text:
A saddle joint is a synovial joint where one of the bones forming the joint is shaped like a saddle with the other bone resting on it like a rider on a horse. E.g. carpometacarpal joint of the thumb.

Hinge joint is a joint between 2 bones such that it allows movement along one axis only. For e.g. ankle, elbow, knee, and interphalangeal joints.

Pivot joint is found between radius and ulna.

Ball and socket joint is found in shoulder

Gliding joints are found in wrist bones.
